# isCandidateListVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that represents the visibility of this item’s candidate list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isCandidateListVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then the candidate list is currently visible, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

When [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCandidateListTouchBarItem/isCollapsed] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], and the item is not obscured by UI then this property is true.

This property is KVO compliant, and you should supply a candidate list when its value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Managing candidate list visibility

- **update(withInsertionPointVisibility:)**: Updates the candidate list visibility configuration based on the client’s insertion point state.

items.description: Updates the candidate list visibility configuration based on the client’s insertion point state.
items.name: update(withInsertionPointVisibility:)
